title: Backwater
description: Both young girls were pretty things; they had hair as black as midnight and skin as white as fresh cr√®me. One was thirteen years of age and the other fourteen, and their lives were about to intersect for the first time. A terrifying experience lay ahead ... one neither girl would forget ... together they would embark on a dark journey and play a dangerous game that would affect the rest of their lives ...A Paranormal, Psychological ThrillerBy Peggy Randall-MartinBACKWATER, Vol 1 of a deadly new series that takes place in New Orleans during the mid-fifties, where VooDoo, bigamy and murder are a La Bauve family tradition.
author: Peggy Randall-Martin
